committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for a 10 percent reduction in the compensation of Members of Congress.

summary.text: Provides for a 10 percent reduction in the compensation of Senators, Representatives in Congress, Delegates from the Territories, and the Resident Commissioner from Puerto Rico. Includes in such reduction the compensation of the Speaker of the House of Representatives, the President pro tempore of the Senate, the Majority Leader and Minority Leader of the House of Representatives.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a 10 percent reduction in the compensation of Members of Congress.
